analysis.purpose: To share a New York Times article about Trump and the UN Security Council regarding Iran

analysis.summary: Jeffrey Epstein emails Stephen Hanson a New York Times article link about Trump and the UN Security Council regarding Iran, with a brief 'please note' message and extensive confidentiality disclaimers.
